text: Greenwood is a town in southern Caddo Parish, in the northwest corner of the U.S state of Louisiana. The population was 3,166 at the 2020 census. it is the third most populous municipality in Caddo Parish (after Shreveport and Blanchard). Greenwood is west of downtown Shreveport. ==References== Category:Towns in Caddo Parish, Louisiana
title: Greenwood, Louisiana
